## Tender for Appraisal of Defense Property

### Notice ID

* Title (English): Appraisal of Goose Spit Property
* Title (French): Évaluation de la propriété de Goose Spit
* Reference Number: WS4157710617-Doc4157737996
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: WS4157710617
* Publication Date: August 23, 2023
* Closing Date: September 13, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

### Tender Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to obtain a market value appraisal report for the Department of National Defence (DND) – Canadian Armed Forces Base Comox (CFB Comox) Goose Spit (HMCS Quadra) Site. The report will provide a comprehensive evaluation of the property's value.

### Contract Requirements

* The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* The winning bidder will be required to provide a market value appraisal report within the stipulated timeframe.
* Bidders must be familiar with the Defence Real Property Appraisal Manual and adhere to its guidelines.

### Eligibility

This tender is open to all eligible bidders, and the government will not limit the number of bidders. Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) vendors are encouraged to participate.

### Tender Details

* Contract Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Closing Date: September 13, 2023, 2 PM ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification regarding this tender, please contact Daphne Yu, PSPC/SPAC, at (613) 998-2988 or daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Notice

To access the complete tender notice, including all relevant information and documentation, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17247424?extsite=MTcyNDc0MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. [1]
